items.name: static let appendToFile: CFStreamPropertyKey!
items.desc: Value is a CFBoolean value that indicates whether to append the written data to a file, if it already exists, rather than to replace its contents.

items.name: static let dataWritten: CFStreamPropertyKey!
items.desc: Value is a CFData object that contains all the bytes written to a writable memory stream. You cannot modify this value.

items.name: static let fileCurrentOffset: CFStreamPropertyKey!
items.desc: Value is a CFNumber object containing the current file offset.

items.name: static let socketNativeHandle: CFStreamPropertyKey!
items.desc: Value is a CFData object that contains the native handle for a socket stream—of type CFSocketNativeHandle—to which the socket stream is connected.

items.name: static let socketRemoteHostName: CFStreamPropertyKey!
items.desc: Value is a CFString object containing the name of the host to which the socket stream is connected or NULL if unknown.

items.name: static let socketRemotePortNumber: CFStreamPropertyKey!
items.desc: Value is a CFNumber object containing the remote port number to which the socket stream is connected or NULL if unknown.
